title: Minimal Carbon Emissions from Waste
description: In 2023, Mauritius recorded one of the lowest carbon dioxide emissions from waste, with a value of just 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

title: Low Military Expenditure
description: Mauritius allocated only 0.52% of its general government expenditure to military spending in 2023, highlighting its focus on non-military priorities.

title: Limited Aid from Sweden
description: In 2021, Mauritius received a minimal net bilateral aid flow from Sweden, amounting to approximately $10,000.

title: Low Benefit Incidence to Poorest Quintile
description: In 2017, only 3.85% of unemployment benefits and active labor market programs were directed to the poorest quintile in Mauritius.
